message: Bob, let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $55, you take $45. A deal now is better than less money later!
Let's split it more evenly. I'll take 52, you take 48. Inflation is coming, don't wait!
Bob, this is a fair deal. Let's settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Inflation is taking its toll! I'm being generous with 51-49. Take it before it's too late!
